title: Tech war: DeepSeek hints China close to unveiling home-grown ‘next generation’ AI chips
description: The artificial intelligence company mentions ‘home-grown chips to be released soon’ on social media, but provides no further details.
content:
Chinese artificial intelligence start-up DeepSeek said that China will soon have home-grown “next generation” chips for AI stacking, fanning speculation over breakthroughs China may have achieved.

title: Microsoft's Mustafa Suleyman Warns Of 'Seemingly Conscious AI', Experts Urge Guardrails
description: Artificial intelligence may soon feel alive, but that doesn’t mean it will be. Mustafa Suleyman, chief executive officer of Microsoft AI, has warned that the world is on the brink of what he calls "Seemingly Conscious AI", which he defines as systems so advanced they mimic memory, empathy and personality, leading people to believe they are interacting with sentient beings.
content:
Artificial intelligence may soon feel alive, but that doesn’t mean it will be.

title: Self-driving vehicle startup Nuro valued at $6 billion in late-stage funding round
description: The latest tranche of $97 million follows the $106 million announced in April, which included investors such as T. Rowe Price, Fidelity, and Tiger Global. Many startups that became unicorns during the 2021 funding boom are now raising capital at lower valuations as investors' attention turns toward artificial intelligence. Nuro has been pushing to scale its self-driving platform and expand commercial partnerships.
content:
(Reuters) -Self-driving vehicle startup Nuro closed its late-stage funding round on Thursday, raising $203 million at a $6 billion valuation from new investors Uber and Nvidia alongside returning backers.

title: ATP flags more than 162,000 abusive comments in first year of protection service
description: BENGALURU - Top men's tennis players were shielded from more than 162,000 social media comments containing \"severe\" abuse during the first year of the Artificial Intelligence-powered ATP Safe Sport initiative, the sport's governing body said on Thursday. Read more at straitstimes.com.

title: Salceda initiates Albay-Tesda partnership for AI Readiness Institute
description: LIGAO CITY – Albay 3rd District Rep. Raymond Adrian Salceda announced an upcoming partnership between Albay province and the Technical Education and Skills Development Authority (Tesda) for the first-ever Artificial Intelligence (AI) Readiness Institute.

title: Meta freezes AI hiring after blockbuster spending spree
description: A hiring freeze at Meta Platforms’ artificial-intelligence operations is in effect after investors voiced concerns about the scale of Meta’s stock-based compensation costs.
content:
Meta Platforms has frozen hiring in its artificial-intelligence division after spending months scooping up 50-plus AI researchers and engineers, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Laivly and Procedureflow Partner to Bring AI-Powered Efficiency to Contact Centers
description: SAINT JOHN, New Brunswick, Aug. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Procedureflow, a leading knowledge management software, today announced a strategic partnership with Laivly, a leader in artificial intelligence solutions for contact centers. This collaboration will combine Procedureflow’s visual guidance with Laivly’s AI capabilities to help contact center teams deliver faster, more accurate, and consistent customer support and customer experiences.

title: Meta Freezes AI Hiring as Surging Costs Raise Concerns, Report Says
description: Meta Platforms reportedly has frozen hiring in its high-profile artificial intelligence division as investors grow concerned about the unit's surging costs.
content:
Meta Platforms (META) reportedly has frozen hiring in its high-profile artificial intelligence division as investors grow concerned about the unit's surging costs.

title: Google Is Trying Everything to Sell AI to Skeptics
description: The launch of new Pixel devices featured a long lineup of celebrities and influencers paid to make the case for artificial intelligence.
